current-chamber.#text: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

official-title.#text: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide a special change in status rule for employees who become eligible for TRICARE.

sponsor.#tail: introduced the following bill; which was read twice and referred to the

short-title.#text: Clarity for Military Retiree Health Care Act

text.#text: This Act may be cited as the

header.#text: Special change in status rule for employees who become eligible for TRICARE

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail: is amended by adding at the end the following new paragraph:

external-xref.#tail: of the Internal Revenue Code of 1986

text.#text: For purposes of this section, if a cafeteria plan permits an employee to revoke an election during a period of coverage and to make a new election based on a change in status event, an event that causes the employee to become eligible for coverage under the TRICARE program shall be treated as a change in status event.

header.#text: Change in status relating to TRICARE eligibility

text.#text: The amendment made by this section shall apply to events occurring after the date of the enactment of this Act.

{http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/}title.#text: 113 S1918 IS: Clarity for Military Retiree Health Care Act

{http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/}rights.#text: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.
